definition: any of various burrowing animals of the family Leporidae having long ears and short tails, hunt rabbits
details:
noun
- any of various burrowing animals of the family Leporidae having long ears and short tails
= synonyms: coney, cony
- flesh of any of various rabbits or hares (wild or domesticated) eaten as food
= synonyms: hare
- the fur of a rabbit
= synonyms: lapin
verb
- hunt rabbits
